contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of October, 2001, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED, and the matter is REMANDED for consideration of the merits of the appeal. See Pa. O.C. Rule 7.1(a), as amended, effective January 1, 2001.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
